dcterms:creator: G.J. Brostow
J. Shotton
J. Fauqueur
R. Cipolla
dcterms:description: The Cambridge-driving labelled video database (CamVid) is a collection of videos with object-class semantic labels, complete with meta-data. The database provides ground truth labels that associate each pixel with one of 32 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: Camvid

dcterms:creator: N. Silberman
D. Hoiem
P. Kohli
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: The NYU-Depth V2 data set is comprised of video sequences from a variety of indoor scenes recorded with an RGB-Depth camera. It features 1,449 densely labelled pairs of aligned RGB and depth images, including 464 new scenes taken at three cities, and 407,024 new unlabeled frames.
dcterms:title: NYUDv2
